search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for GivingFuel (givingfuel.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for GivingFuel can be found at: [https://www.givingfuel.com/pricing](https://www.givingfuel.com/pricing)【3:1†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Sales Questions

Support Questions

![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb2eb1d9d0b44ee7d07fb39/5fb2eb1d9d0b44d82807fcd3_x.svg)

[![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/60a29e74101c41a7247c6b05_givingfuel-logo.png)](https://www.givingfuel.com/)

Everything Your Organization Needs to Fundraise
-----------------------------------------------

Free to You,  
Respectful to Your Donors

All-In Plan

$0/month

[Get Started](https://www.givingfuel.com/sign-up)**Optional transaction fees  
****for** **donors****:  
**

Platform Fee (1.5%)  
+

Standard Credit Card Fees

**🎯 Your Success is Our Priority**
-----------------------------------

Most donors (~80%) choose to cover the fees

When they do, 100% of their gift goes to your mission

If they don't, you \*only\* pay the credit card fees

**What is Included?**
---------------------

Everything GivingFuel Offers

![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/60db6f4986410aee6c28ad8c_Icon%20Drag%20%26%20Drop.png)

### Donation Form / Page Builder

Create powerful customization tools that handle your most **complex fundraising needs**, and sophisticated donation forms that **match your brand** perfectly.

![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/60dc6f8a2513617832cfa598_Icon%20Dynamic%20Data%20Capture.png)

### Donor Management & CRM

Your complete view of donor relationships in one place. Track giving history, manage recurring donations, segment donors, and get the insights you need to strengthen donor relationships and increase retention.

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/60be820296f53a09aedfd0f2_comm-icon.png)

### Marketing & Donor Engagement

Connect with donors where they are. Send targeted emails, set up **automated emails** and **text messages**, and personalized communications that keep supporters engaged with your mission and inspire them to give again.

![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/60be925fab1d98264aaab232_Icon%20Funding.png)

### Payment Processing for Nonprofits

Built specifically for nonprofit needs with enhanced **fraud protection**, **simple reconciliation**, and complete control over your donations. Accept **ACH** payments, enable donors to cover fees, and get detailed transaction reporting.

![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/60be8135c977beabdff72f69_t2g-icon.png)

### Digital Payments (Coming Soon)

Make giving frictionless with **Apple Pay** and **Google Pay** support. Let donors give instantly using their preferred digital payment method, increasing conversion rates and donation amounts.

![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/60be825c99c2716563eeff8f_rec-icon.png)

#### Recurring Payment Auto Updater (Coming Soon)

Never lose a recurring donation to an expired card again. Automatically update expired or canceled cards with new payment information, maintaining your consistent revenue stream without manual intervention.  
‍

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/616f36f9e0a9d280ab3f92a9_icon-grow.png)

### Customizable Reporting & Analytics

Get the insights you need with flexible reporting tools. Create custom reports, track key metrics, and export data in the format you need - all with just a few clicks.

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/60e7a4dd3857075356e339b7_icon-close.png)

### Events, Registration & Ticketing

Everything you need to run successful fundraising events. Manage registrations, assign seating, process tickets, and track attendance while maximizing donations through integrated fundraising tools.

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/60be9336b385ab553e5bf309_crm-icon.png)

### Integrations

Connect GivingFuel with your favorite tools. Seamlessly sync data with popular CRM, email, accounting, and other platforms to streamline your operations and save time.

See All Features
----------------

Discover everything you can build with our flexible donation tools.

[Learn More](https://www.givingfuel.com/features)

**FAQ**
-------

### No contracts? Seriously?  

It’s true - no contracts. For organizations doing impactful work in their communities or around the world, we didn’t like the idea of anyone feeling stuck in a contract they didn’t want. With GivingFuel you can leave at any time. No hard feelings. Your donor data belongs to you and we’ll even help you move it.

### Can I migrate recurring donations to keep them processing?  

You can! If you have recurring donors on another platform, our team can help you keep recurring gifts flowing as you switch to GivingFuel. Fees discussed during onboarding. [Learn more about the process](https://help.givingfuel.com/en/articles/2587000-migrate-and-import-your-recurring-donations-from-another-payment-processor). Questions? [Email us](mailto:team@givingfuel.com).

### Can I migrate my historic donation data into GivingFuel?  

You can! More info on this is provided in the onboarding process.

### What payment gateways can I use?  

GivingFuel by default works with our in house payment processor called Webconnex Payments. If you are processing $500,000 or more in online donations annually and are hesitant to switch payment processors we can discuss migrating you and keeping your current payment processor. [Contact Sales](https://www.givingfuel.com/sign-up).

### Is your pricing “per contact”?  

No. GivingFuel has one simple plan that doesn’t change based on the amount of contacts, donors, or records you use on the platform.

### Do we have to be a nonprofit to use GivingFuel?  

Nope. While most of our customers are nonprofit organizations, any type of business or sole proprietorship can use GivingFuel.

### Can you do whitelabelling, domain masking, or logo removal?  

Yes, [email us](mailto:team@givingfuel.com) for options and pricing.

Take the Next Step
------------------

Book a call with our team to see if GivingFuel could be right for you.

[Get Started](https://www.givingfuel.com/sign-up)

No hidden fees, no surprises, no shenanigans. Just an affordable monthly fee, basic credit card processing, and free & friendly support.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: GivingFuel offers a free tier with optional transaction fees for donors.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes all features offered by GivingFuel.

extracted_content.content:
Pricing Plans - GivingFuel
===============
    

[![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/60a29e74101c41a7247c6b05_givingfuel-logo.png)](https://www.givingfuel.com/)

Choose Your Plan To Get Started
===============================

Create your GivingFuel account by selecting a plan below. Enjoy 3 months free with no contracts or credit card required at sign up.  

### Starter  

For smaller orgs raising less than $25,000 online annually.

### $0 / MONTH  

2% per donation plus standard credit card rates of 2.9% + 30¢.

Basic fundraising

Donor management

[Sign Up](https://signup.givingfuel.com/?packageID=1&utm_cta=package-page)

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6099a69bddeacc2dbbd0761e/60be905bec9a5362cfbb4abc_popular.png)

Most popular

### Pro  

For growing orgs looking to accelerate their fundraising.

### $59 $0 / MONTH  

3 months free, then $59 / month

2.9% + 30¢ credit card fee per donation

Text-to-give

Peer-to-peer fundraising

[Sign Up](https://signup.givingfuel.com/?packageID=2&utm_cta=package-page)

### Enterprise  

For high impact orgs managing multiple campaigns and donor management tasks.

### $99 $0 / MONTH  

3 months free, then $99 / month

2.9% + 30¢ credit card fee per donation

Donor accounts

Reduced text-to-give fees

[Sign Up](https://signup.givingfuel.com/?packageID=3&utm_cta=package-page)

### Enterprise Plus  

For larger orgs raising $1m+ annually online and requiring advanced onboarding and support.

$149 / MONTH

$1-3 million online annually

$249 / MONTH

$3-5 million online annually

$349 / MONTH

$5 million + online annually

[Sign Up](https://signup.givingfuel.com/?packageID=3&utm_cta=package-page)

[Support Center](https://help.givingfuel.com/en/)[Chat with support](https://www.givingfuel.com/help-support)[Schedule a support call](https://calendly.com/givingfuel/solutions?month=2021-07)[Leave a message for support: (888) 317-4539](tel:+18883174539)[Email support](mailto:team@givingfuel.com)

[Features](https://www.givingfuel.com/features)[Pricing](https://www.givingfuel.com/pricing)[Demo](https://www.givingfuel.com/on-demand-demo---form)[](https://www.givingfuel.com/why-switch)[Blog](https://www.givingfuel.com/blog)

[Sign Up](https://www.givingfuel.com/sign-up)[GivingFuel Academy](https://www.givingfuel.com/academy)[Sign In](https://auth.givingfuel.com/)[Security](https://www.givingfuel.com/security)[System status](http://status.webconnex.com/)

© Webconnex 2025

[Terms](https://www.givingfuel.com/terms-of-service)[Privacy](https://www.givingfuel.com/privacy-policy)

We, like the rest of the internet, use cookies and similar tracking technologies that are essential to make our site function, improve your experience, and display personalized content. By continuing to use the site you agree to our [Privacy Policy](https://www.givingfuel.com/privacy-policy) and [Terms of Service.](https://www.givingfuel.com/terms-of-service)

Understood

Create your GivingFuel account by selecting a plan below. Enjoy 3 months free with no contracts or credit card required at sign up.
